name: Tentaclescape
description:
Description

Tentaclescape is made for Minijam114. The limitation "Locked In Place" is incorporated as a mechanic that stops the only weapon the player has.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Flying/Moving

Z - Stopping the Ball

X - Change Mode to Fly/Gravity

Planned Features

SFX and Music

More Enemy Behaviours and Patterns

Credits

AydanG and karataskn20 - Development

Ilgaz and Yagmur - Art
